item.title: The Linux Community: How Millions Collaborate to Build Technology
item.description:
Linux is not just softwareâ€”it’s a global community of developers, maintainers, users, and organizations collaborating across borders, timezones, and languages. This ecosystem has created something unprecedented in technology history.

Distributed Development at Scale

Tens of thousands of developers contribute to Linux development. The kernel alone receives thousands of patches monthly from hundreds of developers. This distributed, asynchronous model has proven remarkably effective.
